caption.p: Case 2 results for imperfect vaccine with reduced coverage. Optimal choices through time for; ( a) the proportion vaccinated ( u 1), ( b) vector control ( u 2), for different values of vaccination costs ( C 2) under imperfect vaccine ( ξ = 0) and reduced vaccine coverage ( σ = 0.5). Other costs held constant: C 1 = 510, C 3 = 400.
